contentList.content: Target's level is too low to use this.
Can cast spell without expending a spell slot.
This is your resource for healing creatures through the <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_HealingSpirit_Heal">Healing Spirit</LSTag> spell.
Can be healed through the Healing Spirit.
This weapon is made of shadows, solidifed and given shape through the power of the Weave.
This bow shoots forth a bolt of lightning.
Conjure an additional familiar per level.
Summon gains +1 to AC, +5 maximum <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit points</LSTag> and deals +1 additional damage on attacks per level.
Spell range increases by [1] per level.
Target deals an additional 1d6 damage of the chosen damage type per level.
Deals an additional 1d6 damage of a random type per level.
Target repeats saving throw each time it takes damage.
Creates two more meteors per level.
Summon gains +1 to AC, +15 maximum <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit points</LSTag> and deals +1 additional damage on attacks per level.
Summon gains +1 to AC, +[1] to their maximum and deals +1 additional damage on attacks per level.
For every [1] spell levels higher than the original, deal an additional [2].
Deals an additional [1] and increases distance pulled or pushed by [2] per level.
Targets still take half damage and aren't pulled or pushed.
Targets still take half damage and aren't slowed.
Targets still take half damage and aren't pulled.
Affects an additional two arrows per level.
Imbue a creature's weapon with holy power, turning it into a <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="HOLY_WEAPON">Holy Weapon</LSTag>.

Emit a burst of radiance from your <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="HOLY_WEAPON">Holy Weapon</LSTag>, causing hostile creatures to become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDED">Blinded</LSTag> and ending the spell.
Targets still take half damage and aren't <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDED">Blinded</LSTag>.
Capture incoming energy, lessening its effect on you and storing it for your next melee attack.

Before being hit, you gain <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RESISTANCE">Resistance</LSTag> to Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning or Thunder damage. The first melee attack made next turn also deals 1d6 of the triggering damage type.
Melee attacks deal an additional [1] of the triggering damage type every level.
Deal [1] with the next melee attack.
When you get hit with Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning or Thunder damage, you can gain <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to the triggering damage type.

Establish a telepathic link with a friendly beast or one charmed by you. The beast gains <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> against creatures within [1] of you.

Telepathically linked to spellcaster and has <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> against creatures within [1] of them. Creature and the spellcaster have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> that would include one another.
Retrieve an object on the ground that weighs up to [1] pounds and launch it at a creature.
Awaken the sense of mortality in a creature, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Frightening</LSTag> it.
Creature repeats the <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> at the end of its turns.
Perform one of several religious ceremonies: Bless Water, Coming of Age or Dedication.
Touch a container of water in a creature's inventory, transforming it to become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLESS_WATER">Holy Water</LSTag>.
Touch a creature, granting it a +[1] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag>.
<LSTag Type="Image" Info="SoftWarning"/> A creature completing this ceremony may never again benefit from the same ceremony.
Touch a creature, granting it a +[1] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.
<LSTag Type="Image" Info="SoftWarning"/> This spell requires and removes 25 gold when cast.

Cause a tremor in the ground becomes <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DIFFICULT_TERRAIN">Difficult Terrain</LSTag> and affects nearby creatures, possibly knocking them <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag>.
Hurl a mass of chaotic energy that randomly deals [1], [2], [3], [4], [5], [6], [7] or [8].
After casting this spell, you roll a d8. On a roll of 1, you automatically target an additional creature within [1] of the original target with another mass of chaotic energy.
Targeted by Chaos Bolt and cannot be targeted by it again.

Detect the presence of aberrations, celestials, elementals, feys, fiends and undead in the area, preventing them from making <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> with <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> against you while they are <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SNEAKING">Hiding</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INVISIBLE">Invisible</LSTag> and also cannot be made with <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag>.

This entity can detect aberration, celestial, elemental, fey, fiend, and undead and prevent them from making <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> with <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> against this entity while they are <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SNEAKING">Hiding</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INVISIBLE">Invisible</LSTag> and also cannot be made with <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag>.

Sense the presence of magic in the area. You can fully focus on a creature possessing the ability to cast spells, preventing it from becoming <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SNEAKING">Hidden</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INVISIBLE">Invisible</LSTag> while its magic can be detected.
Sensing creatures with the ability to use magic.
Creature has the ability to use magic.
Creature cannot become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SNEAKING">Hidden</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INVISIBLE">Invisible</LSTag> while its magic is being detected.
Freezing cold blasts from your fingertips and freezes liquids in the area.
Touch an allied creature, granting it a +[1] bonus to its Initiative <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag>.
Can't be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Frightened</LSTag>. Receive [1] per turn.
Gravity in a [1] sphere centered on a chosen point increases momentarily, potentially halving the <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement Speed</LSTag> of creatures in the area.
Steel your resolve against the Wrathful Smite effect.

Create a [1] magical trap on the ground. It is triggered when a Small or larger creature moves near it, causing them to possibly fall <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag> and become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RESTRAINED">Restrained</LSTag>.

<LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RESTRAINED">Restrained</LSTag> creatures make Dexterity <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> with <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> at the end of their turns, ending the effect on a success. Another creature can use its action to end the effect as well.
A stream of acid emanates from you in the line, possibly covering creatures in the area in acid.
Creatures covered in acid take [1] at the start of their turns.
Create an invisible, mindless, shapeless, medium force that performs simple tasks at your command.
Move like the wind, allowing you to avoid provoking <LSTag Tooltip="OpportunityAttack">Opportunity Attacks</LSTag>.

Until the spell ends, you have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on the next weapon <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> which deals an additional [1]. Hit or miss, you gain an additional [2] of <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement Speed</LSTag> until the end of your turn.
Strike a target with a melee weapon, surrounding them in a booming energy that detonates and deals [1] if it willingly moves.
Choose a fire surface and expand its radius or extinguish an object or fire surface's flames.
Expand the radius of a fire surface by [1].
Extinguish the flames of a fire surface or the flames of an object.
Create a bonfire that burns creatures in the bonfire’s space when casting this spell or when the creature starts or ends its turn in the space.

Create harmless sensory effects that grants you <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on Intimidation <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag> or instantly snuff out or light a source of fire on a object.
Create harmless sensory effects that grants you <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on Intimidation <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag>.
Instantly snuff out or light a source of fire on an object or a fire surface.
Cause a numbing frost to form on a creature, possibly imposing <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on their next <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag>.
Strike a target with a melee weapon, allowing fire to leap from your target to strike a second nearby foe within [1] of them, dealing [2].
Green-flame leaps from your weapon to strike a nearby foe.
Seize air and compel it to possibly push a creature up to [1] away from you, an object [2] away from you or clear clouds in a [3] area.
Seize air and compel it to possibly push a creature up to [1] away from you.
<LSTag Type="Image" Info="SoftWarning"/> A creature can't be pushed if it is greater than medium in size.
Seize air and compel it to possibly push an weighing up to 5 pounds [2] away from you.
<LSTag Type="Image" Info="SoftWarning"/> The object cannot weigh more than 5 pounds.
Seize air and create a gust of wind that distracts non-hostile creatures nearby.
Create a lash of lightning energy that strikes at a creature and possibly pulls them [1] towards you.
This entity has pebble(s) imbued with magic.
Touch three pebbles and imbue them with magic, allowing you or an ally to make a ranged spell attack with them by throwing the pebbles.
Throw one of the magic imbued pebbles.
Deals additional damage equal to the spellcaster's <LSTag Tooltip="SpellcastingAbilityModifier">Spellcasting Ability Modifier</LSTag>.
The number of Magic Stones you possess.
Drive a disorienting spike of psychic energy into the mind of a creature, possibly imposing a -[1] penalty to its next Saving Throw.
This entity's next <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> is reduced by [1].
Create a [1] mud surface that becomes <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DIFFICULT_TERRAIN">Difficult Terrain</LSTag>.
Manipulate earth to your whim, allowing you to create a mud surface that becomes <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DIFFICULT_TERRAIN">Difficult Terrain</LSTag> or to remove a mud surface.
Perform minor magical tricks that light or snuff out fire on some items, cleans certain surfaces or creatures and creates musical notes that can distract others.
The surfaces affected are water, electrified water, blood, electrified blood, poison, oil, grease, web, acid, alien oil, mud, alcohol, silver blood and ash.
Cleaned of blood, dirt and sweat.
Instantly clean a creature of blood, sweat and dirt or remove certain surfaces.
Create music that possibly distracts creatures nearby.
Light or snuff out fire on a weapon or object such as a torch.
Channel primal magic to cause your teeth or fingernails to sharpen, ready to deliver a corrosive attack.
Sap the vitality of a creature, possibly causing it to fall <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag>.
Manipulate water to freeze water surfaces, move a water surface to another location or create a block of ice from a water surface.
Manipulate a water surface and freeze it to become an ice surface.
Manipulate a water surface to change its shape and freeze it into a block of ice.
Manipulate a water surface to move to a different location.
Create a momentary circle of spectral blades that sweep around you to strike nearby creatures.
Create a burst of thunderous sound that affects nearby creatures.
Cause the sound of a dolorous bell to fill the air around a creature, dealing [1] or [2] if it is injured.
Utter a divine word that causes burning radiance to erupt from you to all nearby enemies.
Roaring flame emanates from you in a line.
Draw on knowledge from spirits of the past and become <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficient</LSTag> in one skill you lack proficiency in.
<LSTag Type="Image" Info="SoftWarning"/> This spell ends if you cast it again.
Draw on knowledge from spirits of the past and become <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficient</LSTag> in <LSTag Tooltip="Acrobatics">Acrobatics</LSTag> if you're not already.
Draw on knowledge from spirits of the past and become <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficient</LSTag> in <LSTag Tooltip="AnimalHandling">Animal Handling</LSTag> if you're not already.
Draw on knowledge from spirits of the past and become <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficient</LSTag> in <LSTag Tooltip="Athletics">Athletics</LSTag> if you're not already.
Draw on knowledge from spirits of the past and become <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficient</LSTag> in <LSTag Tooltip="Arcana">Arcana</LSTag> if you're not already.
Draw on knowledge from spirits of the past and become <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficient</LSTag> in <LSTag Tooltip="Deception">Deception</LSTag> if you're not already.
Draw on knowledge from spirits of the past and become <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficient</LSTag> in <LSTag Tooltip="History">History</LSTag> if you're not already.
Draw on knowledge from spirits of the past and become <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficient</LSTag> in <LSTag Tooltip="Insight">Insight</LSTag> if you're not already.
Draw on knowledge from spirits of the past and become <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficient</LSTag> in <LSTag Tooltip="Intimidation">Intimidation</LSTag> if you're not already.
Draw on knowledge from spirits of the past and become <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficient</LSTag> in <LSTag Tooltip="Investigation">Investigation</LSTag> if you're not already.
Draw on knowledge from spirits of the past and become <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficient</LSTag> in <LSTag Tooltip="Medicine">Medicine</LSTag> if you're not already.
Draw on knowledge from spirits of the past and become <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficient</LSTag> in <LSTag Tooltip="Nature">Nature</LSTag> if you're not already.
Draw on knowledge from spirits of the past and become <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficient</LSTag> in <LSTag Tooltip="Perception">Perception</LSTag> if you're not already.
Draw on knowledge from spirits of the past and become <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficient</LSTag> in <LSTag Tooltip="Performance">Performance</LSTag> if you're not already.
Draw on knowledge from spirits of the past and become <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficient</LSTag> in <LSTag Tooltip="Persuasion">Persuasion</LSTag> if you're not already.
Draw on knowledge from spirits of the past and become <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficient</LSTag> in <LSTag Tooltip="Religion">Religion</LSTag> if you're not already.
Draw on knowledge from spirits of the past and become <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficient</LSTag> in <LSTag Tooltip="SleightOfHand">Sleight of Hand</LSTag> if you're not already.
Draw on knowledge from spirits of the past and become <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficient</LSTag> in <LSTag Tooltip="Stealth">Stealth</LSTag> if you're not already.
Draw on knowledge from spirits of the past and become <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficient</LSTag> in <LSTag Tooltip="Survival">Survival</LSTag> if you're not already.
Has <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficiency</LSTag> in Animal Handling <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag>.
Has <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficiency</LSTag> in Sleight of Hand <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag>.
A blue or red flame that cannot be smothered or quenched springs forth from an object that you touch.
A blue flame that cannot be smothered or quenched springs forth from an object that you touch.
A red flame that cannot be smothered or quenched springs forth from an object that you touch.
Dismiss the effects of the Continual Flame spell.
Create a cloud of magical darkness that Heavily Obscures and <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDNESS">Blinds</LSTag> creatures within.
Infuse an item with magical darkness that Heavily Obscures and <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDNESS">Blinds</LSTag> creatures within [1] of it.
Imbue an ally with the power to spew magical energy from their mouth.
Imbue an ally with the power to spew fire from their mouth.
Imbue an ally with the power to spew cold from their mouth.
Imbue an ally with the power to spew lightning from their mouth.
Imbue an ally with the power to spew poison from their mouth.
Imbue an ally with the power to spew acid from their mouth.
Gained ability to exhale fire in a cone.
Gained ability to exhale acid in a cone.
Gained ability to exhale cold in a cone.
Gained ability to exhale lightning in a cone.
Gained ability to exhale poison in a cone.
Summon an elemental force that resembles a dust devil that damages creatures that end their turn within [1] of it and pushed back [2].

If the dust devil moves through a mud surface, it removes the surface and generates a [1] cloud that moves with the dust devil, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SNEAKING_HEAVILY_OBSCURED">Heavily Obscuring</LSTag> the area.
Creatures that end their turn within [1] of the dust devil take [2] and are pushed back [3].
Allow the dust devil to move up to [1].
Possibly deal [1] and push creature back [2] or deal half damage and no push back on a successful save.
Gain the service of [1] familiars, each a fey spirit that takes an animal form you choose.
<LSTag Type="Image" Info="SoftWarning"/> Already summoned familiars disappear when using this spell.
Summon [1] familiars with the form and statistics of a cat.
Summon [1] familiars with the form and statistics of a crab.
Summon [1] familiars with the form and statistics of a frog.
Summon [1] familiars with the form and statistics of a rat.
Summon [1] familiars with the form and statistics of a raven.
Summon [1] familiars with the form and statistics of a spider.

Impart latent luck to yourself or an ally. When the chosen creature makes an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Check</LSTag>, or <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag>, it can choose to gain a +[1] bonus to the roll. Alternatively, when an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> is made against the chosen creature, it can choose to impose a -[1] penalty to the roll.
When a chosen creature applies the bonus or penalty, the spell on that creature ends.

Creature can grant a bonus +[1] to an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> or <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Check</LSTag> of theirs or grant a -[1] penalty against an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> against them.
Activate to grant yourself a +[1] bonus to your next <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Check</LSTag>.
Call forth a nature spirit to soothe the wounded. While a creature is within [1] of the spirit, you can heal it for [2].
This summon can act due to its summoner's command.
Heal a creature for [1] through your Healing Spirit.
<LSTag Type="Image" Info="SoftWarning"/> Once you've healed through your Healing Spirit six times, the spell ends.

Magically empower your movement, giving yourself an additional [1] of <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement Speed</LSTag> and the ability to avoid <LSTag Tooltip="OpportunityAttack">Opportunity Attacks</LSTag>. You can also move through the space of other creatures but you take [2] when ending your turn in their space.

<LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement Speed</LSTag> increased by [1] and don't provoke <LSTag Tooltip="OpportunityAttack">Opportunity Attacks</LSTag>. Can also move through the space of other creatures.
Deal [1] when turn ends while in another creature's space.
Create a hand composed of soil to crush and possibly <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RESTRAINED">Restrain</LSTag> a creature.

An affected creature may use an action to free themselves by making a Strength <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">check</LSTag> against your spell save DC, escaping and no longer being <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RESTRAINED">Restrained</LSTag> on a success.
Crush a <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RESTRAINED">Restrained</LSTag> target or <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RESTRAINED">Restrain</LSTag> a different creature.
Reach for a different creature with the earthen hand, possibly <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RESTRAINED">Restraining</LSTag> it and freeing the previous target.
This entity cannot hide or benefit from <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INVISIBLE">Invisible</LSTag> against the source of the <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_MindSpike">Mind Spike</LSTag> spell.
Breach a creature's mind, possibly preventing it from being hidden and granting it no benefit from being <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INVISIBLE">Invisible</LSTag>.
The entity can't take reactions and can only use movement or take either an action or a bonus action.
Fill a [1] cube with fey and draconic magic, producing random, magical effects when the spell is cast and at the start of your turns.

The magical effects produced in the cube can cause creatures to become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CHARMED">Charmed</LSTag> by you, to be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDED">Blinded</LSTag>, to become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INCAPACITATED">Incapacitated</LSTag> and unable to move or can turn the area into <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DIFFICULT_TERRAIN">Difficult Terrain</LSTag>.
Move the cube of fey and draconic magic up to [1].
Susceptible to a random, magical effect per turn.
A burst of cold energy emanates from you, hindering creatures with ice formations that reduces their <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement Speed</LSTag> to [1].
Break the ice hindering a creature.
<LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement Speed</LSTag> reduced to [1]. Can break ice with <LSTag Tooltip="Action">action</LSTag>.
Create a sword of solidified shadow in your hand which deals [1]. When attacking a target that is in dim light or darkness, the attack is made with <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag>.
Deals [1] and grants <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> against creatures within dim light or darkness.
A flurry of magic snowballs erupts from an area.
Suggest a course of activity and magically influence a creature to become an ally.
A flurry of magic snowballs erupts the chosen area.
Call forth an allied bestial spirit from an environment of Air or Land.
Call forth an allied bestial spirit from the environment of Air.
Call forth an allied bestial spirit from the environment of Land.
Psychically lash out at [1] creature(s), possibly preventing them from taking Reactions and limiting it using movement, an Action or a Bonus Action.
The entity can't take reactions and can only use movement or take either an action or a bonus action.
Cannot take Actions or Bonus Actions.
Cannot take Bonus Actions or Reactions.
Magically twist space around another creature, possibly preparing them to be teleported.
Teleport a creature you've magically twisted the space around to an unoccupied space.
Susceptible to being teleported to an unoccupied space.

Strong wind blows you in a [1] radius while clearing clouds and extinguishing flames on objects. Other creatures within the wind are in <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DIFFICULT_TERRAIN">Difficult Terrain</LSTag>. Creatures also have <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on ranged attacks passing through the wind.
Ranged weapon attacks have <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> made in and out of the area.

Treated as being in <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DIFFICULT_TERRAIN">Difficult Terrain</LSTag> and ranged weapon attacks have <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> made in and out of the area.
Invoke both death and life in an area, causing hostile creatures to wither.
An ally can heal itself to recover <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit points</LSTag>.

Billowing dragon flames blast from your feet, granting explosive speed that increases your <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement Speed</LSTag> by [1] and prevents provoking <LSTag Tooltip="OpportunityAttack">Opportunity Attacks</LSTag>.
When moving within [1] of a creature or an object, it takes [2] per turn.
<LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement Speed</LSTag> increased by [1] and do not provoke <LSTag Tooltip="OpportunityAttack">Opportunity Attacks</LSTag>. Creatures or objects within [2] take [3].
Standing in an area susceptible to lightning strikes from the spellcaster.
Make a calming gesture that forces targeted allies to fall unconscious and gain the benefits of a <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">Short Rest</LSTag>.
<LSTag Type="Image" Info="SoftWarning"/> Once affected by this spell, a creature can't benefit from it again until it finishes a <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag>.
Create several pounds and gallons of food and water as camp supplies.
This pack is filled to the brim with enough food and water to sustain more than a dozen creatures well through a long rest.
Reach into a creature's mind, causing it to lose the ability to distinguish friend from foe.
<LSTag Type="Image" Info="SoftWarning"/> No effect on creatures immune to being <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Frightened</LSTag>.
A fountain of churned earth and stone erupts in the area, changing the ground to <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DIFFICULT_TERRAIN">Difficult Terrain</LSTag>.
Dismiss the effects of Feign Death on a creature.
Touch a ranged weapon held by a creature, causing up to [1] attacks with it to deal an extra [2].
<LSTag Type="Image" Info="SoftWarning"/> The spell ends when the target has made the total number of applicable attacks with the affected ranged weapon.
Ranged attacks using affected weapon deal an additional [1].
This is your resource for the number of Flame Arrows you can use.
Grant [1] creature(s) resistance to psychic damage, as well as <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.
Resistant to psychic damage and has <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.

Sacrifice some of your life to mend another creature's injuries, causing you to take [1] and the targeted creature regains <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit points</LSTag> equal to twice the damage you take.
Create [1] meteors that can be sent streaking towards an area and explode.
Send one or two meteors streaking towards an area.
Send one meteor streaking towards an area.
Send two meteors streaking towards the same area or different areas.
Can send meteors streaking towards an area.
The number of Minute Meteors you can throw.

Five creatures in the area gain [1] and have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on Wisdom <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>. If hit by an attack, an affected creature has <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on its next <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> during combat.
The spell ends on a creature once its <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">temporary hit points</LSTag> are depleted.
<LSTag Type="Image" Info="SoftWarning"/> Cannot affect summoned creatures.

Gain [1] and have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on Wisdom <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>. Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on next <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> after being hit by an attack.
Has <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on next <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag>.

On a failed Intelligence <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag>, the enemy receives 5d10 Psychic damage. Reduce it's vision and receives damage 10d10 Psychic damage if it moves, is pushed or attacks.
Receives Psychic damage if attacks, is pushed or moves.

Call forth a metal construct to fight alongside you. It can <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Construct_Slam">Slam</LSTag> targets and <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="HeatedBody">burn</LSTag> creatures that strike it in melee.

The Construct's <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">Hit Points</LSTag> and damage done increases for every <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">spell slot</LSTag> above the 4th.
Can make a number of attacks equal to the spell level used to summon the construct, rounded down.
Can make a number of attacks equal to the spell level used to summon the beast, rounded down.
Slam your target with a metallic fist.
A creature that hits the construct with a melee attack takes [1].

Create a [1] radius area of magical energy. Celestial, elemental, fiend, fey and undead creatures have <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> against targets within the area, targets within the area can’t be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CHARMED">Charmed</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Frightened</LSTag>, or <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="LOW_GHOST_POSSESSED">Possessed</LSTag> by the creatures, and the creatures cannot enter the area by nonmagical means.

If the creatures try to teleport or fly into the area, they must succeed on a <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> or they are pushed [1] out of the circle.

This entity imposes <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> from celestial, elemental, fiend, fey and undead creatures and cannot be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CHARMED">Charmed</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Frightened</LSTag>, or <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="LOW_GHOST_POSSESSED">Possessed</LSTag> by them.
Touch a dead humanoid. The spell forms a new adult body for the creature to inhabit, which likely causes the creature's race to change, and then calls the soul to enter that body.

Create a [1] radius area of magical energy. Celestial, elemental, fiend, fey and undead creatures have <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> against targets within the area, targets within the area can’t be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CHARMED">Charmed</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Frightened</LSTag>, or <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="LOW_GHOST_POSSESSED">Possessed</LSTag> by the creatures, and the creatures cannot enter the area by nonmagical means.
A stabilized character no longer has to roll Death Saving Throws and will regain [1] after leaving combat.
Creature has been dead for 10 turns and cannot be resurrected with the <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Teleportation_Revivify">Revivify</LSTag> spell.
Can't target creature that's been dead for 10 turns.
<LSTag Type="Image" Info="SoftWarning"/> This spell cannot be used on a creature that has been dead for at 10 turns.

Call forth a fey spirit with a chosen mood: <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SUMMON_FEY_FUMING">Fuming</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SUMMON_FEY_MIRTHFUL">Mirthful</LSTag>, or <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SUMMON_FEY_TRICKSY">Tricksy</LSTag>. The spirit has different spells available depending on the chosen mood.
Call forth a frenzied fey spirit that channels its rage in melee combat.

This summoned fey is furious. After using its <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_FeyStep_Fuming">Fey Step</LSTag> ability, it has <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on its next <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag>.
Call forth a delightful fey spirit able to charm enemies.
This summoned fey is positively captivating. After using its <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_FeyStep_Mirthful">Fey Step</LSTag> ability, it can charm a nearby enemy.
Call forth a mischievous fey spirit able to call forth patches of darkness.

This summoned fey is up to something. When using its <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_FeyStep_Tricksy">Fey Step</LSTag> ability, it can create a patch of darkness that lasts until the end of its next turn.
Teleport to an unoccupied space you can see. Afterwards, get <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on your next <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag>.
Has <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on their next <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag>.
Teleport to an unoccupied space you can see. Afterwards, you can <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_MirthfulCharm">charm</LSTag> an enemy.
Teleport to an unoccupied space you can see. Afterwards, you can create a <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Darkness_Tricksy">patch of darkness</LSTag> that lasts until the end of your next turn.
Aim an attack at a target.
Deals extra damage equal to the spell slot level used to cast the summon spell.
Create a small patch of darkness.
Can create a small patch of darkness.
Charms a nearby enemy, preventing it from attacking you.
The number of turns the creature has been dead for.
You focus on only taking an action this turn due to <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MIND_WHIP">Mind Whip</LSTag>.
You focus on only taking a bonus action this turn due to <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MIND_WHIP">Mind Whip</LSTag>.
You focus on only moving this turn due to <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MIND_WHIP">Mind Whip</LSTag>.
Briefly stop the flow of time for others.
Flow of time has stopped for this entity.
